content: Dungeon Master Note: HP: HP: 39/47, HP: 85/85, HP: 45/45. Player: The combat begins. Describe the scene and the enemies we face.

{
  "plan": "Round 1 begins with three combatants alive: Shadow Relic (initiative 19), Norn (initiative 17), and Shadow Manifestations (initiative 7). Shadow Relic acts first, then Norn, then Shadow Manifestations. No actions taken yet. Combat round set to 1.",
  "narration": "The air in the ancient relic chamber quivers with palpable tension as shadows twist and writhe independently around the domed ceiling etched with shifting arcane symbols. At the heart of the chamber floats the pulsating, ever-morphing shadow relic, its dark essence casting an oppressive chill that seems to seep into your bones. Seven ominous pillars encircle the dais, their carvings recounting the tragic history and terrible power bound within this place. Across the chamber lies the corrupted form of Sir Garran Vael, a knight now fused with shadowy corruption, his burning eyes fixated on the floating relic.

Suddenly, tendrils of shadow coalesce into the sinister silhouettes of Shadow Manifestations, their forms twisting into the embodiment of your deepest fears, guarding the relic with relentless malice.

The shadow relic stirs, a voice whispering promises of power, revenge, and salvation in overlapping tones that claw at your resolve. Your heart pounds as the inevitable clash begins.

Initiative is drawn: The Shadow Relic strikes first, followed by you, Norn, then the shadow manifestations. Steel your spirit and prepare for battle. The shadows wait; what will you do next?",
  "combat_round": 1,
  "actions": []
}

Dungeon Master Note: HP: HP: 22/47, HP: 85/85, HP: 45/45. Player: I rolled a 19 for my first attack and a 17 for my second. My damage is 6+8+3 and then 7+3
Dungeon Master Note: HP: HP: 22/47, HP: 58/85, HP: 45/45. Player: lets do this!

Dungeon Master Note: HP: HP: 22/47, HP: 58/85, HP: 45/45. Player: I attach and use my action surge! My firt roll is a 20! My second a 16 and my third a 19! My damage is 7+6+3 and 6+3 and my third 8+6+3
Dungeon Master Note: HP: HP: 22/47, HP: 16/85, HP: 45/45. Player: I'm ready to finish it off!

Dungeon Master Note: HP: HP: 16/85, HP: 45/45. Player: Actuallym i noticed you didn't advance the round to round 3 and get a new set of dice rolls. Can you roll back the damge against me and proerly advance to roudn 3 to get those new monster prerolls?
Dungeon Master Note: HP: HP: 22/47, HP: 16/85, HP: 45/45. Player: Okay, let's start round 3!
Dungeon Master Note: HP: HP: 22/47, HP: 16/85, HP: 45/45. Player: I attach and roll a 19 and 20. I do 6+7+3 and 7+7+3 damage
Dungeon Master Note: HP: HP: 22/47, HP: 45/45. Player: Whats the initiative order?
Dungeon Master Note: HP: HP: 22/47, HP: 45/45. Player: I blow the horn to summon my allies
Dungeon Master Note: Round 3. HP: HP: 22/47, HP: 45/45. Player: Im ready!
